snippet: Former President Mikheil Saakashvili was stripped of his citizenship, a move one of his supporters described as a settling of scores.
abstract: Georgia's former president Mikheil Saakashvili, now Ukranian citizen and governor of Odessa, is stripped of his Georgian citizenship; country's leader during brief and disastrous 2008 war with Russia is wanted on multiple charges.
lead_paragraph: Former President Mikheil Saakashvili was stripped of his citizenship, a move one of his supporters described as a settling of scores.
